title: About
text:
Hi, nice to meet you! Iâ€™m Lucas.
I am a student of biochemistry at the University Heidelberg, currently working as a visiting student at the Shalek Lab in Boston.
My interests lay in using computatinal approaches to better understand cellular biology in the context of diseases and cellular dysfunction.
